snippet.title: SNES Longplay [215] Super Nova (Darius Force)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty (Read description for Timestamps)

Darius for the Super Nintendo, called Super Nova in eu/us regions.  Played on Hard and shows all 3 routes and endings, using all 3 ships  Boss rush mode also shown at the end.  Also, in hindsite I should have playes the 3 routes in the opposite order.

I found the new control scheme quite an adjustment after player the Sega versions of darius.  When you die, you have to restart the level from the beginning which can get more then a little annoying.  

Also, you have to choose between sideshot and bombs as your secondary weapon but to me, the sideshot was mostly useless so pretty much use bombs throughout.  Also trying to use bth at the same time results in lower overall power of each shot.

00:00:00 - Route 1
00:39:25 - Route 2
00:09:25 - Route 3
01:34:50 - Boss Rush -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
